data.name: Total War Battles: KINGDOM - 1700 Gold
data.detailed_description:
Total War Battles: KINGDOM - 1700 Gold


  • This DLC provides you with 1700 Gold.
  • Once purchased, this DLC will be added to the first Total War Battles: KINGDOM account that logs into the game.
  • This DLC can only be purchased once per STEAM account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 32 bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / Athlon X2 / 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000 / ATI Radeon HD4650 / NVidia Geforce 430 (512MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / Athlon X2 / 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD5850 / Nvidia Geforce GTX 480 (1024MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000 / ATi HD4650 / NVidia 330
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / 2.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi HD5850 / NVidia 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
